title: Hook of Dissonance
info: The Hook of Dissonance is a Hardmode grappling hook which is dropped by Queen Slime with a 33.33*1/3 (33.33%) chance. It launches a single hook that reaches 30 tiles; when the hook attaches to a block, it will instantly teleport the user to the hook's position if the path to the hook is wide enough to fit a player.
